name: Cramuran: Cakes in the dark
description:
Enter the creature of Cramuran's squat and reclaim the lost cakes of the town. A short haunted house, horror experience made for GGJ2021 (with an extra few days of work to polish it off and fix biggest bugs).

Can you get all 3 cakes and save the town, or will you be another victim?

Controls:

Interact - LMB (Left Click)

Toggle Flashlight - F Key

Toggle Inventory - I key

Quit (Instant) - Escape Key

Credits:

3D Models and Animations - Scot Morrison

2D Art and Music - Mitsouko Anderson

Game Design, SFX and Programming - Shane Massaad

Voiceover - Poppy Saunders
